name: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions
desc: Options used when creating Foundation objects from JSON data.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a set of JSON formatting options from an integer that represents those options.

items.name: static var mutableContainers: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that arrays and dictionaries in the returned object are mutable.

items.name: static var mutableLeaves: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that leaf strings in the JSON object graph are mutable.

items.name: static var fragmentsAllowed: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the parser allows top-level objects that aren’t arrays or dictionaries.

items.name: static var json5Allowed: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that reading serialized JSON data supports the JSON5 syntax.

items.name: static var topLevelDictionaryAssumed: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the parser assumes the top level of the JSON data is a dictionary, even if it doesn’t begin and end with curly braces.
